items.title: MCX, BSE, Angel One shares tumble up to 6% as rising India-Pak tensions spook investors
items.description: Nervousness prevailed in the domestic equity markets, with the India VIX index jumping as high as 8 percent

items.title: Coal India: A sequential rise in volume off-take in Q4 in an overall challenging year
items.description: Recent price increases, expected production growth, and other factors augur well for the current fiscal

items.title: Swiggy shares drop 1.5% ahead of Q4 results; Eternal shares down 2%
items.description: Swiggy, which debuted on stock markets in 2024, saw its net loss widen 39 percent to Rs 799 crore in Q3 of FY25.

items.title: Radico Khaitan Q4: IMFL adds punch to sales volume
items.description: Stable raw material prices help in the expansion of gross margins

items.title: Q4 result impact: Pidilite Industries shares surge 2% after net profit surges 41%; Zee, Sula Vineyards shares trade flat
items.description: Sula Vineyards reported a net profit of Rs 13.03 crore for the fourth quarter of FY25. This marks a 4 percent fall from the Rs 13.55 crore net profit reported in Q4 FY24

items.title: DLF, Godrej Properties, other realty stocks tumble up to 5% amid profit booking over rising Indo-Pak tensions
items.description: Nifty Realty index is currently the worst performing sectoral index on the market, extending significant losses for the second consecutive session amid rising geopolitical uncertainties. The index has fallen over 6 percent over these two sessions so far.

items.title: Ideaforge, Zen Tech, other drone stocks surge up to 17% as India responds to Pakistan's aerial attacks
items.description: Drone stocks rallied as investors reacted to news of cross-border attacks and an increased focus on defence preparedness

items.title: Smallcap, midcap indices tumble up to 2% amid rising India-Pak tensions: MCX, RVNL, Suzlon Energy shares drop up to 5%
items.description: "Heightened border tensions and weak global cues dragged down markets and the rupee. Investors are advised to stay cautious, avoid aggressive positions, and focus on fundamentally strong stocks with limited near-term exposure to geopolitical risks," said Shrikant Chouhan from Kotak Securities.

items.title: Asian Paints Q4: Growth slows as competitive intensity tightens grip
items.description: Though Asian Paints is a quality business, the competitive intensity in the sector has started show-ing its colours

items.title: Tata Motors shares extend upside for 3rd day, rises 3% as UK strikes trade deal with US
items.description: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer highlighted a major cut in car export tariffs from 27.5 percent to 10 percent for up to 1 lakh vehicles.

items.title: Taking Stock: Rising cross-border tensions drag Nifty below 24,050; Sensex sheds 880 pts
items.description: For the week, BSE Sensex and Nifty fell more than 1 percent each.

items.title: Bulk deals: BOFA Securities Europe SA acquires 1.68% stake in Angel One, 0.72% shares in Nuvama Wealth
items.description: Angel One shares closed at Rs 2,328.50, down 0.23 percent, while Nuvama Wealth Management stock rose 1.25 percent to Rs 5,944.
